query:
UPDATE problems SET 
problemText = '8. 在图1中，$A$ 是四边形 $BCDE$ 内的一点，满足 $AC \parallel ED$ 和 $AD \parallel BC$。已知 $\angle ABC = \angle AED$ 和 $AB = AE$。
(a) 证明 $	riangle ABC \cong 	riangle AED$。
(b) 如果 $\angle ABC = 39°$ 和 $\angle DAE = 87°$，求 $\angle ACD$。',
problemTextEn = '8. In Figure 1, $A$ is a point lying inside the quadrilateral $BCDE$ such that $AC \parallel ED$ and $AD \parallel BC$. It is given that $\angle ABC = \angle AED$ and $AB = AE$.
(a) Prove that $	riangle ABC \cong 	riangle AED$.
(b) If $\angle ABC = 39°$ and $\angle DAE = 87°$, find $\angle ACD$.'
WHERE id = 30002;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user CpukH5rjPkny7dW.root --database C5wzA5LwhnXBKwVJaMeftJ --execute UPDATE problems SET 
problemText = '8. 在图1中，$A$ 是四边形 $BCDE$ 内的一点，满足 $AC \parallel ED$ 和 $AD \parallel BC$。已知 $\angle ABC = \angle AED$ 和 $AB = AE$。
(a) 证明 $	riangle ABC \cong 	riangle AED$。
(b) 如果 $\angle ABC = 39°$ 和 $\angle DAE = 87°$，求 $\angle ACD$。',
problemTextEn = '8. In Figure 1, $A$ is a point lying inside the quadrilateral $BCDE$ such that $AC \parallel ED$ and $AD \parallel BC$. It is given that $\angle ABC = \angle AED$ and $AB = AE$.
(a) Prove that $	riangle ABC \cong 	riangle AED$.
(b) If $\angle ABC = 39°$ and $\angle DAE = 87°$, find $\angle ACD$.'
WHERE id = 30002;
